## <MapboxGL.MarkerView />
### MarkerView allows you to place a react native marker to the map

### props
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
| ---- | :--: | :-----: | :------: | :----------: |
| coordinate | `array` | `none` | `true` | The center point (specified as a map coordinate) of the marker. |
